website_summaries.verdict: This hammock is great to hang up in your backyard, at a park, or to bring camping.
pros: A top choice for its highly durable material and ultra-secure snap links made from sturdy stainless steel
cons: A handful of customers suggest swapping out the included carabiners with ones that are more durable and that won't fray or damage the hammock

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: Spent four weeks at the National Training Center in California. Spent almost every night in this thing. Most comfortable sleep I've ever gotten when sleeping outdoors. I do recommend a sleep mat/pad on cooler nights because even the slightest breeze will end up cooling you down, even in a sleeping bag. The plus side of this is that it's a great way to stay cool during the day when its warm out. Edit Update 9 June 16: I still have this hammock and it is still going strong. Probably one of the best outdoor investments I've made. It's my go-to item when sleeping outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Never used hammock split down the center!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this hammock. It has been kept inside most of the time. My son has taken it out on the porch a couple of times and brought it back in. It has never been slept in. My son took it on a scout trip Friday 05-04-18 was lying in it after he got it hooked up. He weighs 160 lbs. all of a sudden he started hollering help, help. The hammock slit right down the middle. Is there a refund or replacement available?
customer_reviews.author: nanatrent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Super light, and is super spacious, I also have the straps that match and they are worth it. I took mine to Japan in the back of a CH47F! Material might tear if you don’t take care of it and drag it around like a Neanderthal, but if you take care of your things this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Felo Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love this hammock. I really do. It is cozy, easy to set up, and so much more. Furthermore, it is high quality and oh-so comfortable. The only thing that keeps me from being fully excited about this hammock is that Amazon messed up my order. Not big time, but big enough that I noticed it right away. Online, the hammock that I bought was khaki on the inside with blue lining the outside. After I ripped open the package, I realized the hammock that I had received was blue on the inside and khaki on the outside. Although this hammock is amazing, I am not happy that the colors were switched.
customer_reviews.author: waalkes16

customer_reviews.title: These re-define Hammocks
customer_reviews.text: This is our second doublenest hammock in the family. They both comfortably hold two people. Consider ordering the extra long Eagles Nest Outfitters Polyester Hammock straps over the stander length ones ( You can also purchase extensions if you have the standard length straps( The extra length comes in handy if you are near big trees or you want to sling across and extra long distance. Our first Hammock is over a year old and has held up well with frequent use and travel.
customer_reviews.author: pqlty

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a lightweight casual use hamic this is the hamic to purchase. It’s great for boy Scout. This hamic although, light weight lacks a mosquito net ($110)or a rain fly(I got XL $100). which in my opinion are essentials for anyone seeking to be prepared while camping. In addition to this if you are seeking to use this Hamic as a seat I would recommend purchasing the double Hamic instead of the single as it is substantially more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KTMOM777

customer_reviews.title: No Eno warranty if purchased through amazon
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year of normal use the hammock gained lots of small tears, which eventually turned into me falling through (not far to ground / not big deal) but they have absolutely no warranty because it’s void if you purchase through amazon (check their website ) going to try one of the 20$ Hammock’s because they probably all are made at the same factory anyways just with different patches sewn on...
customer_reviews.author: george bush

customer_reviews.title: Decent leisure hammock.
customer_reviews.text: This has been an good hammock. From testing to sleeping it has worked quite well. Personally, I think I want to get something more integrated. If you intend to sleep in this it ends up being quite a modular setup (hammock, suspension, bug net, underquilt, rain fly, etc). Not that there is anything wrong with this set up, it just becomes a lot to lug around, set up, and tear down. For leisure and just hanging out, this doesn't get much better. Edit: While I have only used it a few times, I'm noticing there are small tears forming. Not enough to cause damage to the hammock, but enough to have me concerned on the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lackofagoodname

customer_reviews.title: This product is so much better than I even thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: This product is so much better than I even thought it would be. It is actually VERY comfortable to sit or lay in. At first you feel like the thing will break if a heavy person sits in it, but it will definitely hold (400 lb limit). The material is thin and very flexible so you don't have to worry. It's a great product that in the Summer I hang it outside, and in the winter I hang it in my basement between two columns. Best seat in the house... Only downside is that you pretty much need to buy the straps separately because the original hammock hooks are too short for much. Other than that, I love my ENO!
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Best hammock on the market
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter and her hammock towns they create at track and XC meets. Very durable compared to the one I got for myself (off brand) that already has tears and significant wear and tear after minimal use and 3 years). I think you get what you pay for with the hammocks currently on the market and ENO will stand behind their products. Even with slightly higher price points, I have no reservations recommending ENO hammocks.
customer_reviews.author: MOScott

customer_reviews.title: Durable. Comfy. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this little gem on the treasure truck for future camping excursions. Right now, it’s hanging in our backyard. I had never used this type of hammock before and it took a few minutes to set everything up. Overall it is easy to use, holds up well, super comfortable and compact. An added plus or minus, depending on your situation, it was easy to clean up after my 2year old peed in it. The liquid pooled in one spot and didn’t soak through. Maybe it would have if I let it sit long enough but I was able to clean it quickly without a doggy mess afterwards. Dried fast, too.
customer_reviews.author: SheaFam

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo daughter had wanted a hammock for a while. I got this one now that we are home and we both love it! We spend a ton of time in it during work and school -from- home breaks. She reads in it and bird watches. It took 4 minutes to hang. Be sure to order the straps to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding customer service from Seller NetRush
customer_reviews.text: The Eagles Nest is as comfortable as we anticipated but I’m especially grateful for the outstanding customer service we received from NetRush when our original purchase got delayed in transit (a USPS error, not the seller’s). We were sent a replacement hammock immediately and sustained regular correspondence with our NetRush service rep. We will definitely make future purchases through NetRush!!
customer_reviews.author: NGF

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, comfortable, and good value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a birthday gift for my thirteen year old Boy Scout son, and he loves it! He and his brothers attach it to trees, our playset, etc. We purchased the tree straps separately and were glad we did. They really increase the distance that you can have between objects (trees) when trying to find a spot to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for relaxing/camping/and all around
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually camping in mind as I write this review. I’ve always wanted an Eno but finally got around to getting one and I am beyond happy with it. It feels tough and very comfortable. There’s so many ways you can lay or sit in it, and you can burrito yourself. Keep in mind straps are sold separately! I’d definitely recommend the XL straps as it gives more versatility to where you can chillax
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing mode engaged
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Have to adjust a bit to find the “sweet spot” but once you find it, it is amazing. Especially in the spring when it’s perfect weather out and a nice cold beer in hand.
customer_reviews.author: Andree Resurreccion

customer_reviews.title: I love this hammock!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hammock! Very comfortable, easy to set up and to put away, very easy to clean, perfect for camping or just hanging out in your own backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable but probably won’t last long
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my daughter for her 13th birthday on June 5th. It’s ridiculously comfortable, lightweight, and super easy to set up. However, she’s only had it for two weeks and the threading is already starting to fray. In addition, it didn’t come with straps and the carabiners it did come with are sub par. For the price (+ straps) I would expect this to last her a long time and I’m afraid that won’t be the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Koeppen

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Hammocking is a big deal at my school, everyone has eno hammocks and we use them all the time. I recently bought this and it split right down the middle just the 4th time I used it- very disapointed to say the least. At the time, I wasn't doing anything that would warrant it ripping either, just laying there.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: No competition
customer_reviews.text: Bought different brands of hammocks through amazon and was not impressed with any of them. Eno is the most expensive, but the best overall hammock. You pay for what you get! Lightweight, durable, washable, adjustable, and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: Happiness and rest for less than $100
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more happy. My best moments these days are in my Eno hammock. I even bought a 2nd one a week later for my parents so they could share in my joy. I recommend getting the double nest as you can wrap yourself in it like a cacoon
customer_reviews.author: Laura S.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Eno!!
customer_reviews.text: It was worth it to buy the Eno brand isn't of one of the many copy cat brands out there. My eno has stood the test of time. It is very durable and easy to clean. I love the bright colors and how comfortably it fits 2 people!
customer_reviews.author: mk342

customer_reviews.title: Meets all of my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: The material is extremely thin, (thinner than paper), but VERY sturdy! Super lightweight and easy to assemble. I feel 100% comfortable in the hammock. The straps are separate, I bought these ones:  Highly recommend this product! Setting up and taking down is easy, and the directions are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney K

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a while elephant gift, and everyone wanted it! The hammock rolls into a really compact pouch that isn’t too heavy or too big!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Benigno

customer_reviews.title: Little more room than my single
customer_reviews.text: Already have a single ENO. Trying to sleep diagonally, the single was a bit tight. Although the ENO's are 9 foot, and an 11 foot would work better diagonally, I thought the extra width would help; it did. The low price on this color was hard to pass up. I have been sleeping in the double with no issues. I will try this in the field with the rest of my ENO accessories I've been using for relaxing only. This will be a less expensive test than ordering up several hundred dollar "cottage" rig.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: Great hammock for camping, hiking, or just a day in the park. It's lightweight, comfortable, and easy to use. I've even used it to sleep in when camping, not a bad way to sleep! You do need to buy Tree Straps to hang it. You can make your own, I bought ENO's straps and they are SUPER easy to use. Pros: - Comfortable - Durable (Mine's 4 years old and still going strong) - Lightweight - Fun - Set up anywhere Cons: - Need to buy tree straps to hang - It's a tight fit for two. Excuse my awkward picture... it is the only one I have of it set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery P.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for a college student & they LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Most colleges allow for hammocks to be hung in the trees and these are very popular. This gift was loved by the college student that got it. It has held up very well and will be going back again for another year in the fall. He says he has slept in it outside, studied in it and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: StampingScrapbookingMom

customer_reviews.title: Best hammock out there for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This was the second of these hammocks I purchased. They are great!! I got this one for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Jer12377

customer_reviews.title: Ugly comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love these hammocks. I have a single nest, so I decided to get a double too. Only downside is I ordered a solid color without realizing it and it's ugly as hell, but I don't feel like exchanging it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.MAGA

customer_reviews.title: one of my favorite amazon purchases
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made! The material is strong and sturdy and I've used the hammock over 10 times now with no issues whatsoever! It's fairly simple to set up, but note that you have to buy the straps for suspension separately (I use the Atlas Suspension system and that works great as well.) If you love hiking, camping, or just being in nature, it is a brilliant investment! Perfect for reading, homework, or just chilling! My only recommendation would be to bring a blanket to lay on if it's cold or windy as the thin (but strong) material makes it easy to get cold! Otherwise, absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel L Keebler

customer_reviews.title: The Best In The World
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE it! Very well put together. I contacted the company to tell them how pleased I was with their product and they sent me stickers in the mail! Check out their site, they have a lot of other neat backpacking type gear and gadgetry. If you plan on using this indoors, definitely get the indoor hanging kit. The default hangers aren't strong enough to support your weight. The kit is cheap enough. I sleep in this hammock every night and love it. Consider wrapping up in a blanket if your room is cold; the fabric is very thin (but very strong) and will freeze your little butt off!
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the summer of 2015 and still love it. I decided to go for an Eno after speaking with several Eno owners and seeing how much they loved theirs. It is compact and easy to store when not in use and great for traveling because of its size. The only wear and tear I currently have is two or three fraying pieces of the nylon (I believe that’s the material) of the outermost edges.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammock just over year ago and it has been amazing but was starting to rip in a few places. I emailed customer service and the response time was so impressive. Less than an hour before I heard back, a few emails later and I had a replacement coming my way. As a person who uses her hammock multiple times in a week it was great hearing I would have a replacement in just a few days. I would recommend anybody use this company.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Cacoon lord
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and trustworthy. Also wraps around nicely so you won't fall out. Makes a nice little cacoon if it's just one person, like my lonely self.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I flippin love this thing. I didnt realize I bought the double but im glad I did! it has held up way past the weight limit. I, along with my toddler and husband have all cuddled up in this thing for a nap multiple times! I will probably buy another for camping and keep the one I have for just around the house
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Underwood

customer_reviews.title: I can read in it or nap for hours in complete comfort.  It is sown very well with good fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hammock for recreation or camping. I have used this two summers at my cabin and I can say it is sown very well with good fabric, shows little wear and should last a long time. The fabric is cut so It curves just right under my back and I can read in it or nap for hours in complete comfort and I'm 55 and 6'1". The fabric breaths great and it never feels hot or sticky. I would not hesitate to camp with it along with tree straps, bug net and rain fly. Stuffs easily into its sewn-in pocket and just crushes into a little ball. Five stars for comfort, quality, value and the memory of happy summer naps.
customer_reviews.author: Gomojo99

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Hammock is great! Comfortable and good size for someone 6’2”. It did arrive smelling terrible though, had to leave it outside to air out for a few days before we could sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hammock out there in my opinion. I know people talk about them being too pricy, but coming from someone who was in a cheap hammock over concrete when it broke, my tailbone and I don't mind spending the extra money. It has been to countless festivals and camping trips and has never done me wrong. I put my sleeping bag in it and sleep in it all night and am comfortable. And, we even had 4 of us in it at one time watching a concert. Would recommend to anyone needing a hammock (and really amazon is the place to buy them.. I did a lot of research and this is the best deal).
customer_reviews.author: KG303

customer_reviews.title: Experience the outdoors differently
customer_reviews.text: You cannot possibly go wrong with ENO hammocks. They are high quality, light weight and extremely durable. For being compressed to the size of a small cantaloupe, the hammock is deceptively large when completely sprawled out (9 feet, 10inch long) leaving plenty of room for you or another. I would like the see the hammock come with hanging straps included (only comes with two plastic carabiners to hang) but they sell nice straps separately, of course. I would recommend purchasing two climbing grade metal carabiners to replace their plastic ones- just to be safe. Overall, fantastic product and I will continue buy these.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wassmer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: This hammock exceeded all of my expectations. So easy to put up anywhere and very fast to take down and stow. Great for trails are hiking, and when I stop the eat for lunch or a cool spot by a creek, I just pop this thing up in under 3 mins and I am relaxing...stows just as fast and off I go. I highly recommend the Atlas straps with the purchase...they made putting this up on trees so easy and the many loops on the straps made sizing it quick and easy to suit my height off ground.
customer_reviews.author: BARRY

customer_reviews.title: Hammock holes
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice it at first, but recently found holes in my double. I never noticed it until today due to I use my single. My family owns 6 of them and never had an issue until now.
customer_reviews.author: David Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Great product overall. Minor fraying on one side of the hammock (single nylon panel)
customer_reviews.text: Great product, as always from ENO. Strung this up in my backyard with two (6 inch x 6 inch x 8 feet) wooden posts. Buried roughly 22 inches into the ground, no concrete. Hammock has held up well so far. But there are some frayed strings coming off of one side of the hammock. The fraying is not occurring on the stitching. Likely means nothing structurally wrong, and hopefully just an imperfect cut of nylon.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: BEYOND comfy and so insanely easy to set-up (but also buy the Atlas Straps to ...
customer_reviews.text: BEYOND comfy and so insanely easy to set-up (but also buy the Atlas Straps to go with it.) The DoubleNest is a winner. Packs down so small you can easily take it wherever you want. SUPER!!! Also like the neutral/earth tone colors so it blends with the scenery while camping. (Also, remember, as cute as the available bright colors are, if you go with crazy/fun colors, you may attract insects/bees looking for flowers in the spring and summer!) Definitely go with the DoubleNest. Even for just one person, it makes it very cozy and you don't have to worry about stuff (book, blankets, etc) falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fun to go backpacking with friends who all have ENO ...
customer_reviews.text: My most treasured item! Has seriously changed the quality of my life! I use it for backpacking, day hiking, taking naps, car camping. Fun to go backpacking with friends who all have ENO hammocks too! The Atlas straps are a must! Comfy with my boyfriend in it too. I would not suggest taking it overnight backpacking when temps could be around 30F, or if that is the case then bring along your lightweight air mattress and blow it up partially and place over the hammock and sleep on that so you have more insulation.

customer_reviews.title: Room for Two, Sort Of
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband. We both enjoy hiking and I thought it would be nice to have a hammock that we could use whenever we wanted to take a break. The color options were great and so was the price. The only compliant I have is that while yes, two people fit in this hammock, they fit really really closely. We look like a venn diagram in that hammock and when it's summer in Texas it's not always fun to be in a dog pile like that. I'm thinking about buying two individual hammocks so we have some space when it gets hot. Other than that, I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Bath

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go camping. I had a few problems. #1 some of the stitching in not reassuring what so ever! #2 the colors are running and fading after having it for just1 month. #3 mine has developed these black stains after having it for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hammock, better than expeted!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially attracted to this hammock because of the great price, but after opening it up and trying it out I'm completely impressed! The colors are great, the fabric is extremely comfortable and keeps you cool while you're lying in it, and the little attached bag makes packing it a breeze. And it's even stronger than listed, it says 400 lb weight limit, and we tested it at almost 500 lbs and it held completely strong! It's great to spend time in alone, and even better to use to cuddle up with someone else! I'm completely satisified, and would definately recomend this to anyone looking for a comfortable quality hammock for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Penny Lane

customer_reviews.title: ... had this hammock for about two years and I love it! I have taken it on dozens of ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hammock for about two years and I love it! I have taken it on dozens of camping and backpacking trips, climbing excursions, and even just for hanging in the park or in a friend's backyard. It has held up very well and easily squeezes down into its little storage pocket. I have HangTight Hammock Straps that I use with it that also work great. This hammock definitely has many more years in it, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Love it! But get the double!
customer_reviews.text: This is a “must-have” for any hiker/biker/kayaker... get the double is yes I guess you could fit two people in it, but it is nice for one to be able to wrap it around you. The si glue is way too small IMO (preference I guess). Have had it for years, still in great shape.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Mills

customer_reviews.title: ENO Double Nest - Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my 12 and 14 year old. Overall great quality product, seems very durable and the kids just love them! The Double Nest is great for a 6' 3" guy like myself or two kids could fit in it as well. The straps are the key, get the Atlas Straps,which provide staggered loops all the way down the strap giving you the ability to set the right distance when suspending between trees/posts etc. The others do not have this ability, its worth a little extra dollars!! If you found my review helpful, please feel free to indicate it below. Thanks! :)
customer_reviews.author: Scott 😀

customer_reviews.title: ... 13 year-old niece because apparently "it's what all the cool kids have
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my 13 year-old niece because apparently "it's what all the cool kids have." ;-) She loves it. Exactly what she wanted, sturdy, comfortable and she really loves lying in it and reading. Great purchase! P.S. I got the Atlas straps because all the reviews I read said go ahead and purchase them. They're a sturdier and just do a better job. I think the few extra bucks were worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, color may seriously vary
customer_reviews.text: ENO hammocks are known to be great and the one I bought was no different quality-wise. One thing to note: when they say that your colors may vary due to using all the material available to them, they mean it. I expected the solid grey hammock I ordered to have black stitching as depicted but it was bright royal blue. Still a great hammock but doesn't match my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Shayan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first introduction into hammocking, I bought the double knowing that my kids would want to get in it with me, or their mom, or each other, and it definitely accommodates us. I've watched several videos on hammocking and hammock camping, not sure I'm ready for the overnight in it as I'm still tinkering with the angle and height adjustments from tree to tree for maximum comfort, but very happy with the hammock overall. I can tell that I will be buying another one (or more) of these as my kids have really taken to this one.
customer_reviews.author: BamaConstruction

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price to get the real thing
customer_reviews.text: Higher quality than knock offs I looked at. For size, comfort and ease of use - this is a winner
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY ENO
customer_reviews.text: LOVE MY ENO!! I take it everywhere with me and my boyfriend and I use it everywhere, at the park, on hiking trails, even in my backyard. One thing I've noticed though, is that, when I put on bug spray and get into my Eno, it leaves greasy spots. I'm too afraid to put it in the washing machine in case in rips so I just hang it in my backyard and take the hose and dish soap to it and the spots come right out! Overall, such a great buy and I highly recommend it for any outdoorsy person or anyone who wants to be outdoorsy and enjoy the fresh air!
customer_reviews.author: SurvivingStudent

customer_reviews.title: Eno is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: While there are off brand products just like it, there is something about an Eno that no competitor can beat. Rugged yet comfortable design and it allows you to sleep anywhere there are two locations. My truck hitch and a light post; yep. Two trees like normal people; duh. Across a river if you're a beast; totally. Great buy and I will purchase again once I need another. Going on three years so might not be for a while!
customer_reviews.author: joshgolden21

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is amazing! Some friends of mine recommended the double nest and it is perfect! I put it on a hammock stand in my back yard, so I don’t need the straps to go to a tree yet. Love the colors of this one! So fun
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment, thoroughly enjoy.
customer_reviews.text: When I take my hammock places, people are always dying to try it (or in some cases, try to steal it from me for an evening). I was expecting to buy black, but I decided to try the aqua and purple. I love it so much. It's bright and vibrant, without being harsh on the eyes. It dries quickly when I inadvertently drop it in a puddle, and it's easy to set up. I have the matching slap straps, and even with those, it's easy to pack on trips. A great investment.
customer_reviews.author: BecauseITry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, strong, reliable hammock
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this hammock. Fiancée and I both fit nicely in it. Our first hammock so we were worried at first but the hammock is incredibly strong and allows us to sit in it various ways. We have laid opposite of each other, next to (head to head) and sitting up in it (where feet dangle off the side). I paired this with the HangTight Hammock Tree Straps. This hammock packs down tightly making it easy to take backpacking. Set up and take down is made easy with the hammock being able to stuff inside the attached sack.
customer_reviews.author: B. Janae

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great product
customer_reviews.text: I go to college in an area with a lot of hiking and trees so every time I go outside I have it with me, including when I go to class. Each of my friends gave in and got one too and they are so fun to set up on trees around each other and we have never had a problem with falling or hurting the trees. I always check the bark to make sure it hasn't hurt the tree but I've never seen any problem. It's super light and easy to set up or take down.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: It’s fantastic. But there’s no surprise here as Eno is the leader in portable hammocks. It’s far more compact than I expected it to be and every bit as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality Hammock
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage son who goes 'hammocking' in town. Who knew there was such a thing??? This is his second hammock that he's owned and he absolutely loves it. The three things he loves most about it are: 1) very high quality materials and workmanship 2) great assortment of colors to choose from 3) large size - can fit two people in it! If you are looking for a product that will last few years, you've found it. Happy Hammocking!
customer_reviews.author: Sonny G

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Purchases
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hammock. The colors are exactly what the advertisement looked like. I can take it anywhere with me. Very durable material and very comfortable. The bag is very small and it still amazes me how all the fabric and the carabiners can fit in it. The straps I purchased along with the hammock itself are very durable and simply go around any tree or strong post. It is very easy to set up the hammock, very simple and stress free. I give this eno a 10/10, would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: sjessee88

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend the Atlas Straps with the Hammock
customer_reviews.text: The only way to Camp, especially if you're an expedition Kayaker or Backpacker and you only have limited storage. I have several ENO Doublenest Hammocks and would camp without them. I had other brands first but they never held up. Highly recommend the Atlas Straps with the Hammock, but skip buying the rain fly, I have one but never use it. It's easier and cheaper to purchase an 8×10 camo tarp, 100' 3/8 rope, small metal tent stakes, bungee balls and just make your own.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Bliss
customer_reviews.text: I've found a new way to camp. I used this hammock on a cross-country trip and slept on treeless beaches and in eucalyptus trees. The versatility of this hammock is astounding. I have not slept with another person in it but like the extra size for use as an impromptu wind block/ canopy. I've found that if I put my nalgene or knife in the side pouch i can toss the excess material over the other side of the hammock and essentially cocooning myself in. This takes away from the wind on those chilly nights, helps trap heat, and works as a bug shield of sorts.
customer_reviews.author: theoutdoortype

customer_reviews.title: If you've never had an ENO hammock before - you're missing out.
customer_reviews.text: If you've never had an ENO hammock before - you're missing out. I went with the blue/red because I'm a flashy kinda person, but my coworkers have green and they're super nice too. Basically these hammocks are the best and used by all of the trail guides in the company I work for and even if you're sleeping solo - the doublenest is pretty awesome for one! Super easy to carry and perfect for lightweight camping.
customer_reviews.author: K Bean

customer_reviews.title: Missing straps
customer_reviews.text: Unsure about package. I ordered the Enu which should have come with straps to attach it to poles/trees. No straps included. Only clips on ends. Packaging says it should have straps but nothing. Not sure how I can get these.
customer_reviews.author: April Alaspa

customer_reviews.title: Going solo in the double
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This makes the great outdoors downright luxurious. (1) Find a spot with a view, (2) hang the hammock, (3) bliss out. It takes all of 5 minutes to set up or pack up (make sure you get the Atlas straps). If you are new to camping hammocks, there are helpful tips and instructions on YouTube and elsewhere. The nylon is porous - on a hot day your backside stays cool and dry. On a cool night, you need some layers. So small and light, the hammock + straps fits in my biking backpack with room to spare. And olive/olive is perfect for stealth hanging in the woods. Just be warned ... hammocks are addictive. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: loftapartment

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son in Peru. He is 6'2" and he fits in it comfortably and he loves it. Helps keeps the bed bugs and mosquitos off of him. I loved how small it comes, about the size of a grapefruit making it very easy to ship and carry around him and not be a lot of weight. This company makes an outstanding product.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy the straps separately
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter in college, only to find out I need to buy $25+/- straps in addition to the $70 hammock. Ugh. My bad for not researching it more.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: My son really loved this but
customer_reviews.text: My son really loved this but, unfortunately, I bought it for him for Christmas and by the time he used it, he only got one use out of it before it broke on the second use. Now, it doesn't seem that we can exchange it. Very disappointing and a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue O

customer_reviews.title: My first suspension hammock and couldn't love it anymore
customer_reviews.text: My first suspension hammock and couldn't love it anymore. I spent 90 minutes last Saturday in my back yard just hanging out (code for napping). While I am not a huge outdoors person, I love the idea of just heading to a park, strapping up and reading a book or listening to some music. If you're considering a hammock of this nature, I don't think you can go wrong with ENO's Doublenest product.
customer_reviews.author: DaveB59

customer_reviews.title: not exactly what i ordered, but okay.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hammock to get the one pictured, as in the same colors. What i received is the same colors just the inverse. As in gray trim and lime green main body. Not a big deal if that pattern doesnt bother you, or if you dont mind being surprised. All in all i still got a great hammock, an eno! Also this supports a good cause. So it's all good, i just wish i got the color i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: cstarke

customer_reviews.title: Best hammock I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: The green color is so beautiful! This hammock is easy to care for, dries quickly, easy to put away. It fits into a very small pouch and takes up NO room in a backpack! Must have for camping or lounging at home. Best
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rated for 2 people, might be tight for that - Very comfortable for one person, Light, Ultra Simple Setup, nice fabric
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a chance to use this with some slaptraps. I must say, very functional and comfortable. I little spendy but the brand is good. I don't think two people would be very comfortable unless they wanted to be very close, but I slept in this with a giant sleeping back and was super comfortable all night. Easy to deploy and easy to pack up. Fits in a sack sewn into itself, packs into the size of a large grapefruit after use. Happy with purchase, stitching looks like it will last for years. I am 200 lbs and had no worries.
customer_reviews.author: Townsaver87

customer_reviews.title: The BEST - Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Best hammock ever! So comfortable! So easy to put up! Set this up between 2 trees in my backyard. Have fallen asleep in it numerous times. The air flow still comes thru the material which I find nice. So easy to clip up and take down so it doesn't get weathered in the yard. AND IT REALLY IS EASY TO PUT BACK IN ITS POUCH. I can be lazy putting things back in containers etc... This is so easy I have no reason not too.....
customer_reviews.author: us

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!!! Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I now own 3 of these hammocks. I started with one, then got on for my wife (which my daughter decided was hers) then ordered this 3rd one so my wife would have her own again. ENO makes these with great quality and they really last. I've had mine for over 5 years and used it camping a bunch. The last camping trip we took, I just left the tent at home and brought these with a few tarps in case it rained. You can set one of these up in about 2-5 minutes and they are very comfortable. I highly recommend these and the ENO brand seems to be the best quality and best choice of colors
customer_reviews.author: James Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed with mine
customer_reviews.text: I own a classic Hennessey Hammock (asym) and I love it for camping purposes - I haven't modded anything so the set up isn't the easiest. I bought my ENO because I really wanted something for casual use and day hiking (and because I'm obsessed with hammocks). Outfitted it with Atlas straps per other reviewers recommendations which did drive up the cost a little. But I love how compact it is (throw it into my travel duffel back) and setup is so easy and secure.
customer_reviews.author: CaptCarrot

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to a young man that didn’t thank me
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W. Serbent

customer_reviews.title: Best Hammock Ever
customer_reviews.text: I had always wanted a hammock, but being a big guy, I was worried about being in a hammock that was not well built. Not only did this one fit the bill, but it is light, small and very compact. I cannot believe that the whole hammock fits in that very small bag. Comes with 2 snap links to hook you hammock to tree straps or whoopie slings. I got the khaki/olive one to be psudo-camo, and it is very subdued. Every time I lay in it, I feel very secure. The fabric feels thin, like parachute material, but still held me up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: ENO
customer_reviews.text: I leave mine outside. It’s been beaten by wind, rain and corrosive island air. Still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will probably buy another one for my friends to use! Big hit :)
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! The double fits 2 grown adults who are on the skinny/athletic side well. It's spacious for one person. The atlas straps (sold separately but are worth the $30) are an excellent addition and make the hammock setup easy to put virtually anywhere. Love this hammock! Fun colors, very durable. Excellent for backpackers and outdoor lovers :)
customer_reviews.author: LG

customer_reviews.title: Kid's love these hammocks
customer_reviews.text: I had to get 3 of them since all of my boys were fighting over the one. Easy to set up and take down if you get the straps (sold separately).
customer_reviews.author: Lee Glanville

customer_reviews.title: Nice hammock
customer_reviews.text: Nice hammock. Got this one when my sons was stolen. I did not know it did not come with the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Jeffus

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with big stains on the outside
customer_reviews.text: Hammock is fine but the seller sent it with black smudges on the outside of the bag it folds into. Kind of gross but after some scrubbing it came off
customer_reviews.author: KAF_EmpireState

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in the extreme
customer_reviews.text: This hammock is, in a word, amazing. I am a good sized guy (6'2", 220), and it has ample room for me to relax and sway in the breeze. Easy to set up at home or camping, and really comfortable. I was a little concerned that I would have a hard time getting it back into the stuff sack, but that was a misguided worry. You don't even have to try very hard, simply grab the carabiners and roll and smoosh it into the sack, then cinch it down with the included strap. Takes up almost no room in my backpack, and well worth the space.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tillman

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you read description
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the fine print like I should have it does not come with straps so go ahead and order them with it. Was a great product just had to wait longer to use because I didn’t read all the description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome investment.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I can take it anywhere and put it on anything! It is very portable- make sure you get the slap straps. REI has the slap straps on sale for $20 sometimes- it makes the experience so much easier. I took mine to the top of a sand dune and chilled for an hour- true peace and no sand in my bikini. It held me and my boyfriend (and the next time I went to the dunes with my mom, my mom liked it too). It completes any relaxing experience. Its an investment, but you will have it forever as it is quite the quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Be the coolest kid on the block with this bad boy
customer_reviews.text: This Hammock is AMAZING. It's really comfortable, easy to set up, stores great in it's tiny little bag. My only complaint is that sometimes the stitching that attaches the border digs into my skin if I lay on it wrong, but the majority of the time it's really relaxing (I fall asleep in it constantly). I got the bright orange color and it looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Gs

customer_reviews.title: Out of all three sizes, I'd buy the double again
customer_reviews.text: I have been fortunate enough to own all three sizes of ENO's hammocks (single, double, double deluxe). Hands down the best size of the three is the double. It is roomy enough to sit in across the width of the hammock, but not too roomy that when you sleep/lay in it you feel like you are drowning in fabric. If you only want one ENO buy the double.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia Nettesheim

customer_reviews.title: Easy to pack. With Eno straps easy to hang.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this hammock for a year now, the best purchase ive ever made. Extremely durable, light, and breezy. The slightest wind cools you down significantly on a hot day. No problems yet!
customer_reviews.author: TheMotaMan

customer_reviews.title: You NEED this hammock!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a ENO for the longest time and search for going for a cheaper brand but, I am glad I waited to save up for this one cause I love it! I love how compact it can fold up (even if you do not how to fold it properly), and you will never lose the pouch since it is sewed to the actually hammock. It also fits two people inside easily, depending on how you both lay it may not be so comfortable but, it definitely is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah A.

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We love this hammock! It's incredible easy to set up (we bought the emo straps that go around trees). It's durable and comfortable. My husband is 6'4", and thinks it's really comfortable to lay in, even with our two little kids ;) They love swinging in it too. It's a win for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten A Yahnke

customer_reviews.title: Great way to camp without being on the ground!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our eight year old “Cub Scout” grandson for his birthday. He loves it and is definitely the envy of others in his den.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Get this hammock
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted after my beloved cotton, Brazilian hammock sprung it's last few strings and sent me to earth. Never could happen with this one. It's so pretty, spacious, and really does smush into its attached storage/carry bag. Be sure to tie it up when not in use because it acts just like a spinnaker on a boat, catching the slightest breeze and providing quite the display. I'm hoping the careeners are sturdy enuf. I'm proud of this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Judi M.

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading and click "Add to Cart"
customer_reviews.text: Trust me. This hammock is simply amazing. I don't know how else to describe it. The material is extremely lightweight and super comfortable. It is also very, very durable. I weigh 240lbs and feel very secure in this thing. I can "wrap" the extra fabric right around me. The doublenest is the perfect size for us big people, and even if we were to become fit, the extra room is just more comfortable. I could lay in this thing forever. It packs down in its own compression bag pretty small. "Grapefruit" size is probably wishful thinking, but it's pretty small considering what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Eli Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great hammock
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the summer and loved it. My nephews (2 of them at the same time) got in and were swinging for hours with no wear or tear. Wire gate snap links hold well and the material is super light weight. It all packs into the small carrying bag (attached) and goes real small with the cinch strap.
customer_reviews.author: LDRSHP

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and strong
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs down tiny. It weighs next to nothing and hods my 250lbs well. My only complaint is that you'll need to carry something to put between you and the hammock if it's even slightly windy outside. When I camped with it the first time my bottom half froze due to wind chill. I now use a cheap foam pad or an extra sleeping bag under me and it works great. Easy to set up. I like that I can use the extra fabric to cover myself and keep most of the bugs at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Kris H

customer_reviews.title: Good Room and Easy to Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Bought with extra straps. Very durable and roomy. I am 5'2'' and 112lb and was able to share it with my boyfriend who is 145lbs (although more comfortable to sleep in your own!). Tree fell on my hammock and ripped my rain fly, but hammock stayed in tact! The color was beautiful as well!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Orlowski

customer_reviews.title: Terrible do not buy unless you want to buy straps after you buy your hammock
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate this product, I brought it out in the woods in a good mood and came back into the house in a terrible mood ready to return this product. What kind of hammock comes with NO STRAPS TO PUT IT ON THE TREE! Get real
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ENO, Eagles Nest Outfitters DoubleNest Lightweight Camping Hammock, 1 to 2 Person
product_meta.description: The DoubleNest reigns supreme. It's our bread-and-butter. It's your all-access pass to relaxation. Big enough for two and palatial for one, the DoubleNest still manages to stuff easily into its attached compression sack. Take it anywhere, set it up in seconds flat, lay back and oh, did you want to join me? I've got room for one more! Weight: 19 Ounces; Folded Dimensions: (Dia x L) 4" x 5"; Unfolded Dimensions: (L x W) 9' 4" x 6' 2". PLEASE NOTE: HAMMOCK SUSPENSION STRAPS ARE SOLD SEPARATELY.
feature_bullets: HAMMOCK FOR TWO: The DoubleNest is versatile, durable, and compact, making it perfect for camping, hiking, or lounging around with a friend.
ADVENTURE READY: Weighing only 19 ounces, the DoubleNest stuffs easily into attached storage bag. Packed Dimensions: (L x W) 5" x 5"; Unfolded Dimensions: (L x W) 9' 4" x 6' 2".

TRUSTWORTHY MATERIAL: Falling is not an option, unless it's to sleep. Made from 70D High Tenacity Nylon Taffeta, this breathable, quick drying nylon supports up to 400 pounds. (HAMMOCK STRAPS NOT INCLUDED)

MASTER THE ART OF LOUNGING: Includes Aluminum Wiregate Carabiners and nautical grade line with stainless-steel snap links allowing you to secure the DoubleNest to trees, poles, boat masts, or even the wall.
PLEASE NOTE: ENO attempts to reduce potential waste by using every bit of fabric available in production, so the color and stitching of the your hammock might vary from what is pictured.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
